stripe-url.title: Payment url is sent!
stripe-url.msg1: Hi. Sorry for somewhat delayed reply. Payment request is approved and the manager just sent Nortain VPN's home url with verify code.
stripe-url.msg2: You can click the link to stripe url(started https://checkout.stripe.com/) showed up on a modal in our website url(https:nortain.top/).
stripe-url.msg3: We just notice you that we do not send any other url without started https:nortain.top/ if you got any other url then DO NOT ENTER THE URL on the email.
stripe-url.msg4: Now you can proceed to pay by clicking our home page url below,
